definition: party affairs/work within the Communist party
party/association/club/society/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Dang
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Electronic party affairs are a new method to strengthen the party construction in colleges in the new era.
sentences.chinese: 電子黨務是新時期加強高校黨建的全新載體。

sentences.english: In 20 years, he is engaged in majority time party work works.
sentences.chinese: 二十年中，絕大部分時間他在從事黨務工作。

sentences.english: This is a major issue facing the Party workers.
sentences.chinese: 這是黨務工作者面臨的主要課題。

sentences.english: In demand of being a party affairs worker, we need to update our idea and keep up with the times.
sentences.chinese: 更新觀念，與時俱進，是時代賦予黨務工作者的要求。

sentences.english: Competent people can take charge of Party work or support services.
sentences.chinese: 好的可以管黨務工作，管後勤工作。

sentences.english: His election is a payoff for years of loyal party work.
sentences.chinese: 他的當選是多年來忠實致力於黨務工作的結果。

sentences.english: But, existing party work management information system is existing however a lot of inadequacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，現有的黨務管理信息系統卻存在着很多不足。
